snippet: A new study finds that New York, New Jersey and Maryland are the best states at helping residents’ incomes rise. Louisiana, Oklahoma and South Carolina fared worst in the study.
abstract: Study from the Economic Mobility Project at the Pew Center on the States finds that New York, New Jersey and Maryland are the best states at helping residents’ incomes rise; Louisiana, Oklahoma and South Carolina fared worst in the study, which looked at the incomes of Americans in each state over a 10-year period.
lead_paragraph: A new study finds that New York, New Jersey and Maryland are the best states at helping residents’ incomes rise. Louisiana, Oklahoma and South Carolina fared worst in the study.

headline.seo: Northeast and Mid-Atlantic States Most Upwardly Mobile
headline.main: Memo to Would-Be Members of the 1%: Move to the Northeast or Mid-Atlantic
headline.print_headline: Memo to Would-Be Members of the 1%: Move to the Northeast or Mid-Atlantic
